author: Benjamin Disraeli
message: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Give thanks for the rain of life that propels us to reach new horizons.
title: Thought of the day

message: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
title: Thought of the day

message: We all have problems. The way we solve them is what makes us different.
title: Thought of the day
